categories: Category:Battles of the Second Imperial Civil War

nodes.text: The Bombing of Falleen occurred when the people of Falleen refused to align themselves with Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire. The Imperious-class Star Destroyer Darklight was deployed to bombard the planet into submission. However, the attack was disrupted by the Mynock, with the aid of Rogue Squadron, which had been sent by Admiral Gar Stazi. Cade Skywalker with the aid of Jedi Master Wolf Sazen managed to board the Darklight and destroy it with a number of thermal detonators.
